title: Scary Zombies [Action, Eng, 2018]
description:
There was a terrible tragedy with a virus of zombies. These zombies filled cities and villages. But the scientists of one of the laboratories managed to find the vaccine and the virus was over. Almost all cities have not had a zombie for a long time. But there are a couple of sectors that need to be cleaned from zombies. You are an excellent specialist and you have not one sector of the city remained clean from zombies. Choose weapons and ammunition in the city. Try to clean one more sector and stay alive.

Control keys:
WASD - Character Movement
SPACEBAR - Jump
SHIFT - Sprint
Esc - Exit the menu
LMB - Shoot
RMB - Aim

System:

ОС: Windows 7 +
CPU: 2 GHz
RAM: 512 mb
VRAM: 256 mb
HDD: 755 mb
